Warren Buffett Is One Stock Picker Who Believes He Can Still Beat the Market In letter to Berkshire shareholders, Buffett reasserts faith in own ability to pick winners and losers By Google+ Updated Feb. 26, 2017 8:18 p.m. ET 
Warren Buffett was dismissive of professional money managers in his widely read letter to Berkshire Hathaway Inc. shareholders. But the billionaire reasserted his belief in his own ability to pick winners and losers.
